title: Sherlock Holmes - The Royal Scandal (2000)
description: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle\&#039;s first Sherlock Holmes story - the world\&#039;s greatest detective faces a most alluring adversary... Legendary opera star Irene Adler is threatening to destroy the King of Bohemia\&#039;s reputation with proof of their illicit affair. The evidence? A photograph. Her ransom? The king\&#039;s hand in marriage. But not only does investigating detective Sherlock Holmes already know Irene from the past, he also knows that the queen of manipulation would never resort to such a common crime. After uncovering her true ambitions, Holmes draws the cunning songstress into a well-matched game of cat and mouse. Starring Matt Frewer as Sherlock Holmes.
